/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their leafless branches reaching towards the overcast sky, suggesting that the photo was taken during the winter season. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. A few cars and motorcycles are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, connecting the two sides of the city. The colors in the image are muted, with the gray of the overcast sky and the brown and beige tones of the buildings and trees creating a harmonious palette.
